title: Sprint Planning
content: The team discussed and prioritized user stories for the upcoming sprint.Estimated story points and defined acceptance criteria.

title: Backlog Grooming
content: Refined the product backlog, adding new user stories and updating priorities. Discussed dependencies and potential risks.
actionItems: Create tasks for new user stories

title: Impediment Resolution
content: Team members reported impediments and discussed strategies for resolution. Identified ways to improve collaboration and communication.

title: Release Planning
content: The team discussed the overall project timeline, milestones, and release goals. Aligned on the scope for the upcoming release.
actionItems: Coordinate with QA for testing plan

title: Product Demo
content: Demonstrated the latest product features to stakeholders, showcasing completed user stories. Gathered feedback for further refinement.
